transform_def.name: arccosh_two_2_arcsinh_two
transform_def.string: let x = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) z = 2 * sqr(x) + spread r = weight * log(z + sqrt(z + 1) * sqrt(z - 1)) in toVec2(r)

transform_def.name: arccosh
transform_def.string: let z = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) r = weight * log(z + sqrt(z + 1) * sqrt(z - 1)) in toVec2(r)

transform_def.name: arccoth
transform_def.string: let z = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) r = weight * log((z + 1) / (z - 1)) in toVec2(r)

transform_def.name: arccsch
transform_def.string: let z = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) r = weight * log(sqrt(1 / sqr(z) + 1) + 1 / z) in toVec2(r)

transform_def.name: arctanh_shift
transform_def.string: let z = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) result = weight * log((z + complex(1.0, shift)) / (-z + complex(1.0, -shift))) in vec2(result.re, result.im)

transform_def.name: trigH_Functions
transform_def.string: let hs = if(trigH_Functions_HexSquare > 0.0, pi() / 3, pi() / (2.0 * sqrt3())) in trigH_Functions_init_result(trigH_Functions, trigH_Functions_Func * 6.0, hs)

let z = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) * hs sinhz = 0.5 * (-exp(-z) + exp(z)) coshz = (exp(-z) + exp(z)) * 0.5 tanhz = exp(z) / (exp(-z) + exp(z)) - exp(-z) / (exp(-z) + exp(z)) cothz = (exp(-z) + exp(z)) / (exp(z) - exp(-z)) sechz = 2.0 * exp(z) / (exp(2.0 * z) + 1.0) cschz = 2.0 / (exp(z) - exp(-z)) function = if(func < 1.0, sinhz, if(func < 2.0, coshz, if(func < 3.0, tanhz, if(func < 4.0, cothz, if(func < 5.0, sechz, cschz))))) in toVec2(function) * weight
